results.name: Self-inverse permutation of natural numbers, A245703-conjugate of balanced bit-reverse: a(n) = A245704(A057889(A245703(n))).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10080
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: Other identities. For all n >= 1, the following holds:
A010051(a(n)) = A010051(n). [Maps primes to primes and composites to composites].
program: A002808(n)={ my(k=-1); while( -n + n += -k + k=primepi(n), ); n}; \\ This function from _M. F. Hasler_
isA014580(n)=polisirreducible(Pol(binary(n))*Mod(1, 2)); \\ This function from _Charles R Greathouse IV_
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 07 2014
